_sText: This is a small mappack that includes two aim/gungame maps. Aim_cirkular_dev and Aim_cirkular_aztek |Story| Aim_cirkular_dev is the original map. I build it one day six months ago in an attempt to learn a friend how to build maps with curved brush work. I never thought about releasing this map when i build it so I didn´t spend much time at details. When I was done with my teaching I thought that it was wasted work if I trashed it. So I spend additional ten min´ and added some ladders and spawnpoints. I called some friends and we played some gungame on it, it was realy fun. They liked the map and wanted me to upload it on banana. But I though that it wasn´t worth it. Now six months later, they still want me to upload it. I said : Ok i do it , but I think I want to change the texture theme first. So I loaded it up in hammer and changed all textures so i got a aztek/stone look at the whole thing. I also added some paths on the ground and some mild fog to make it harder to spot people on the other side of the map. And aim_cirkular_aztek was born. It´s cool what a couple of new textures can do to a map. That is also why I uploaded both versions, so you got the ability to compare them with each other. ok blabla...blabl.. |end of the Story| |General map features| (same on both maps) Spawnpoints: 16 Buyzone: yes, at spawn Sun: yes Nav-file: yes in the rar.file |final notes| |This two maps are most fun to play on a gg servers // Tip | Have fun and keep playing! /Alex If I choose to spend more time at this map, it would probably be a second "theme" change. So if you have any texture/theme suggestions feel free to post
